localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Resquared is a web app that has data on every local business and makes it easy to reach out to them with built-in marketing tools. If you were trying to sell to restaurants, you’d open Resquared, create a search, and have access to thousands of restaurants.
blogPost.body: Resquared is a web app that has data on every local business and makes it easy to reach out to them with built-in marketing tools. If you were trying to sell to restaurants, you’d open Resquared, create a search, and have access to thousands of restaurants.
blogPost.title: Resquared - Marketing software for reaching local businesses.
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Resquared是一款网络应用，它拥有当地每家企业的数据，并通过内置的营销工具让你轻松接触到他们。如果你想向餐馆销售，你会打开Resquared，创建一个搜索，并可以访问成千上万的餐馆。
localize.tagline: 覆盖本地企业的营销软件。

localize.description: Resquared是一款網絡應用，它擁有當地每家企業的數據，並通過內置的營銷工具讓你輕鬆接觸到他們。如果你想向餐館銷售，你會打開Resquared，創建一個搜索，並可以訪問成千上萬的餐館。
localize.tagline: 覆蓋本地企業的營銷軟件。
